title: Forge is failing to setup
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [X] Foundry
- [X] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (63ed109 2022-08-09T00:03:50.892098571Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

forge test

### Operating System

Linux

### Describe the bug

I think the latest foundry version introduces a bug in the `ffi` cheatcode.

A quick way to reproduce the error:
Clone my repo here: https://github.com/pcaversaccio/snekmate

Run the tests with the following forge version:
```
forge 0.2.0 (128f060 2022-08-04T08:11:04.1114486Z)
```

Run `foundryup` and run it with the latest version. That's the output I get:

```sh
[⠘] Compiling...
[⠊] Compiling 28 files with 0.8.15
[⠔] Solc 0.8.15 finished in 5.09s
Compiler run successful
2022-08-09T13:48:12.266229Z ERROR forge::runner: setUp failed reason="Revert" contract=0xb4c79dab8f259c7aee6e5b2aa729821864227e84

Running 1 test for test/utils/ECDSA.t.sol:ECDSATest
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: Revert] setUp() (gas: 0)
2022-08-09T13:48:12.269373Z ERROR forge::runner: setUp failed reason="Revert" contract=0xb4c79dab8f259c7aee6e5b2aa729821864227e84
Traces:
  [13634] ECDSATest::setUp()
    ├─ [8504] VyperDeployer::deployContract("src/utils/", "ECDSA")
    │   ├─ [0] VM::ffi(["vyper", "src/utils/ECDSA.vy"])
    │   │   └─ ← 0x
    │   └─ ← "ZeroBytecodeLength(0xce71065d4017f316ec606fe4422e11eb2c47c246)"
    └─ ← "ZeroBytecodeLength(0xce71065d4017f316ec606fe4422e11eb2c47c246)"

Test result: FAILED. 0 passed; 1 failed; finished in 564.54ms

Running 1 test for test/utils/Create2Address.t.sol:Create2AddressTest
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: Revert] setUp() (gas: 0)
Traces:
  [13611] Create2AddressTest::setUp()
    ├─ [8504] VyperDeployer::deployContract("src/utils/", "Create2Address")
    │   ├─ [0] VM::ffi(["vyper", "src/utils/Create2Address.vy"])
    │   │   └─ ← 0x
    │   └─ ← "ZeroBytecodeLength(0xce71065d4017f316ec606fe4422e11eb2c47c246)"
    └─ ← "ZeroBytecodeLength(0xce71065d4017f316ec606fe4422e11eb2c47c246)"

Test result: FAILED. 0 passed; 1 failed; finished in 567.65ms
2022-08-09T13:48:12.279680Z ERROR forge::runner: setUp failed reason="Revert" contract=0xb4c79dab8f259c7aee6e5b2aa729821864227e84

Running 1 test for test/utils/CreateAddress.t.sol:CreateAddressTest
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: Revert] setUp() (gas: 0)
Traces:
  [13634] CreateAddressTest::setUp()
    ├─ [8504] VyperDeployer::deployContract("src/utils/", "CreateAddress")
    │   ├─ [0] VM::ffi(["vyper", "src/utils/CreateAddress.vy"])
    │   │   └─ ← 0x
    │   └─ ← "ZeroBytecodeLength(0xce71065d4017f316ec606fe4422e11eb2c47c246)"
    └─ ← "ZeroBytecodeLength(0xce71065d4017f316ec606fe4422e11eb2c47c246)"

Test result: FAILED. 0 passed; 1 failed; finished in 577.73ms

Running 3 tests for test/utils/EIP712DomainSeparator.t.sol:EIP712DomainSeparatorTest
[FAIL. Reason: EvmError: Revert] testCachedDomainSeparatorV4() (gas: 5098)
Traces:
  [93920] EIP712DomainSeparatorTest::setUp()
    ├─ [42269] VyperDeployer::deployContract("src/utils/", "EIP712DomainSeparator", )
    │   ├─ [0] VM::ffi(["vyper", "src/utils/EIP712DomainSeparator.vy"])
    │   │   └─ ← 0x
    │   ├─ [0] → new <Unknown>@"0x037f…dd8f"
    │   │   └─ ← 0 bytes of code
    │   ├─ emit ContractCreation(newContract: 0x037fc82298142374d974839236d2e2df6b5bdd8f)
    │   └─ ← 0x037fc82298142374d974839236d2e2df6b5bdd8f
    └─ ← ()

  [5098] EIP712DomainSeparatorTest::testCachedDomainSeparatorV4()
    ├─ [0] 0x037f…dd8f::8d69626e() [staticcall]
    │   └─ ← ()
    └─ ← "EvmError: Revert"

[FAIL. Reason: EvmError: Revert] testDomainSeparatorV4() (gas: 8696)
Traces:
  [93920] EIP712DomainSeparatorTest::setUp()
    ├─ [42269] VyperDeployer::deployContract("src/utils/", "EIP712DomainSeparator", )
    │   ├─ [0] VM::ffi(["vyper", "src/utils/EIP712DomainSeparator.vy"])
    │   │   └─ ← 0x
    │   ├─ [0] → new <Unknown>@"0x037f…dd8f"
    │   │   └─ ← 0 bytes of code
    │   ├─ emit ContractCreation(newContract: 0x037fc82298142374d974839236d2e2df6b5bdd8f)
    │   └─ ← 0x037fc82298142374d974839236d2e2df6b5bdd8f
    └─ ← ()

  [8696] EIP712DomainSeparatorTest::testDomainSeparatorV4()
    ├─ [0] VM::chainId(31338)
    │   └─ ← ()
    ├─ [0] 0x037f…dd8f::8d69626e() [staticcall]
    │   └─ ← ()
    └─ ← "EvmError: Revert"

[FAIL. Reason: EvmError: Revert] testHashTypedDataV4() (gas: 8982)
Traces:
  [93920] EIP712DomainSeparatorTest::setUp()
    ├─ [42269] VyperDeployer::deployContract("src/utils/", "EIP712DomainSeparator", )
    │   ├─ [0] VM::ffi(["vyper", "src/utils/EIP712DomainSeparator.vy"])
    │   │   └─ ← 0x
    │   ├─ [0] → new <Unknown>@"0x037f…dd8f"
    │   │   └─ ← 0 bytes of code
    │   ├─ emit ContractCreation(newContract: 0x037fc82298142374d974839236d2e2df6b5bdd8f)
    │   └─ ← 0x037fc82298142374d974839236d2e2df6b5bdd8f
    └─ ← ()

  [8982] EIP712DomainSeparatorTest::testHashTypedDataV4()
    ├─ [0] VM::addr(1)
    │   └─ ← 0x7e5f4552091a69125d5dfcb7b8c2659029395bdf
    ├─ [0] VM::addr(2)
    │   └─ ← 0x2b5ad5c4795c026514f8317c7a215e218dccd6cf
    ├─ [0] 0x037f…dd8f::ca41a5d1(6b8ca9e44983c5c18a4e75eb62aa9651f7c60b7b24d4cc8439771656bd415652) [staticcall]
    │   └─ ← ()
    └─ ← "EvmError: Revert"

Test result: FAILED. 0 passed; 3 failed; finished in 577.71ms

Failing tests:
Encountered 1 failing test in test/utils/Create2Address.t.sol:Create2AddressTest
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: Revert] setUp() (gas: 0)

Encountered 1 failing test in test/utils/CreateAddress.t.sol:CreateAddressTest
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: Revert] setUp() (gas: 0)

Encountered 1 failing test in test/utils/ECDSA.t.sol:ECDSATest
[FAIL. Reason: Setup failed: Revert] setUp() (gas: 0)

Encountered 3 failing tests in test/utils/EIP712DomainSeparator.t.sol:EIP712DomainSeparatorTest
[FAIL. Reason: EvmError: Revert] testCachedDomainSeparatorV4() (gas: 5098)
[FAIL. Reason: EvmError: Revert] testDomainSeparatorV4() (gas: 8696)
[FAIL. Reason: EvmError: Revert] testHashTypedDataV4() (gas: 8982)

Encountered a total of 6 failing tests, 0 tests succeeded
```

could you plase check that your current vyper is actually 0.3.6?

I downgraded src/utils/*vy to ^0.3.4 and worked with my 0.3.4 vyper installation
thx for that catch @mattsse - that was the issue! reminder at myself: only do dev on my Ubuntu laptop and not on Windows with different WSL versions.
